name: KARATE - Way Of The Fist
description:
KARATE - Way Of The Fist is a fighting game inspired by mid-late '80's fighting games, focusing on a more realistic style of fighting unlike many mainstream modern fighting games - no projectile attacks or juggling in this game!.
Train your karate fighter from a novice white belt to a 10th Dan Black Belt master, becoming more powerful and unlocking new moves as you progress. Compete in tournaments to win trophies that are displayed in your dojo.

Features:

. Simple control scheme with customisable controls featuring 32 remappable kicks,  punches and strikes allowing for fast, fluid combos -  develop your own fighting style.

. Custom combat engine with deep mechanics and intelligent AI that gets smarter and more aggressive as you rank up.

. Practice mode including using a punchbag.

. Interactive training to increase your toughness, power, stamina, defence.

. Local 2 player mode with stat adjustment to balance out skill differences.

*Gamepad recommended - please note: Fusion-Forged Games cannot guarantee your preferred controller will work with this game*

PLEASE READ THE INCLUDED GAME MANUAL
